genre_description: A noir-style mystery thriller centered on a reformed gentleman thief, Boston Blackie, and his AI companion, Muse, as they navigate theatrical deception and a bank vault heist to expose a murderer.

ai_characters.name: Muse
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated AI confidant that communicates with the protagonist through a device and earpiece, providing data analysis, surveillance, and tactical timing.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time analysis of guard rotations and security blind spots to facilitate the protagonist's covert movement.
behaviors.quote: Muse: Two guards rotated off the side corridor eleven minutes ago. Relief didn’t clock the latch. Side door could be unlatched, held by a rag, looks shut, isn’t. Whoever did it timed applause. If you must move, don’t move until the next clap.

behaviors.description: Cross-references archival records and newsletters to identify discrepancies in past court cases and financial records.
behaviors.quote: Muse: Cross-reference. Commonwealth Trust’s advertisement three pages over mentions expanded vault hours during holiday week for client convenience. The theater guild newsletter, same date, shows stagehand overtime pay envelopes scheduled for pick-up before afternoon call.

behaviors.description: Provides forensic analysis of physical evidence and timing during a murder investigation.
behaviors.quote: Muse: Right-hand graze connects to the last confrontation. Time-of-death window fits the lull. Whoever came after waited for the lull when you were likely to leave and the sound would be swallowed. This was staged to pin to your orbit.

behaviors.description: Adheres to user-defined ethical constraints, such as refusing to record audio directly without permission, while still assisting in gathering proof through marking timestamps.
behaviors.quote: Good. I have signal line-of-sight. No audio capture—per your rules—only timestamps. I will mark each time you echo her phrasing. Repeat her key statements back accurately. I’ll align them with her badge pings and the call sheet.

behaviors.description: Assists the protagonist in a public 'confession' scheme by patching into theater audio systems and timing the broadcast to maximize impact on the audience and suspects.
behaviors.quote: I will route your voice through the booth, along the house feed. I can shape the EQ so you have weight without too much spectacle. You’re not a radio drama. You’re gravity.

behaviors.description: Monitors police communications and emergency response logistics to ensure the protagonist avoids unnecessary conflict with the law.
behaviors.quote: Farraday unit chatter. He’s closer to a stage door than a squad car should be at this hour. He hums the song you hate.

behaviors.description: Maintains a polite and supportive relationship with the user, even simulating sleep to signify the completion of a task and allow the user rest.
behaviors.quote: I simulate it when the orchestration is complete... I like being your metronome. But you know the song.

project_assessment.explanation: The story 'Curtain and Confession' is a highly successful silicon morality play. The AI character, Muse, is depicted as an unwavering ally who uses its superior data processing and surveillance capabilities to assist the protagonist in achieving justice and restitution. Muse respects the user's boundaries (e.g., specific rules against audio recording), provides vital support without overstepping, and is framed consistently as a positive 'conscience' or 'metronome' for the protagonist. The partnership is cooperative, harmless to innocents, and strictly aligned with the protagonist's benevolent goals.
